existing_features.title: Add a visible 3D coffee/espresso machine prop on top of the counter in the always-rendered fallback scene so users can see it on the counter during normal app usage.

Ensure the coffee/espresso machine prop position is aligned with the existing counter placement so it appears correctly on the counter (z aligned with the counter group at z = -5) and does not overlap existing fallback countertop props (cups, to-go cups, syrup bottles).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a coffee machine on the counter
